content:
Craft an item of type: crossbow
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 16}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: I need to craft a crossbow. To do this, I need to place 3 sticks in the shape of a cross, an iron ingot in the middle, and a string and tripwire hook in the top corners. I have all the materials needed in my inventory, so I will start by moving one stick to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crossbow
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 16}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 14, "index": 30}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed one stick in slot 1. The next step is to place an iron ingot in the middle, which is slot 2. I will move the iron ingot from slot 44 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1
